remarks: A group multiple is the same if evaluated in a submonoid.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jun-2015.)
statement:
submmulgcl.t $e |- .xb = ( .g ` G ) $.
submmulg.h $e |- H = ( G |`s S ) $.
submmulg.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` H ) $.
submmulg $p |- ( ( S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) /\ N e. NN0 /\ X e. S ) -> ( N .xb X ) = ( N .x. X ) ) $.
